attributes.action: Change Scotland’s capital city from Edinburgh to Glasgow.
attributes.background: Glasgow is a better and more advanced city than Edinburgh. Therefore it should be promoted to capital city of Scotland.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. You can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
